name: Stanley Warri
bio: My Name Is Stanley Warr And I Am PHP Freelancer , PHP Freelancer Nigeria, PHP Programmer Nigeria With Strong Background In Core PHP, Wordpress, Joomla, Drupal, Zen Cart, OS Commerce, Expression Engine ,Open Sources and MVC Frameworks Like CakePHP, Zend, Codeigniter. I Have Found My Deepest Passion To Be Around The World Of PHP, Wordpress And Search Engine Optimization Standards.
